ygData.subject: Re: gnome kabobs
ygData.msgSnippet: **Technically, the below information could be loosely construed as a Spoiler , but since Trade Skills have been spoiled for 10 months already, i don t think
ygData.messageBody:
**Technically, the below information could be loosely construed as a "Spoiler",
but since Trade Skills have been spoiled for 10 months already, i don't think
anyone really cares 8)**

{i'll just leave a small space}

All the PvP recipies that are known to me at this time trivial out at 60
Baking.

AFAIK, the quickest way to get baking up is to (after getting some +int gear 8)
) is to do Batwing Crunchies (1 Batwing, 1 frosting [buy the Batwings at the
freeport mages guild, frosting purchaseable from Parthar in EC, amongst other
places...]) which trivials at 45..then do Fish Fillets (1 Fish, 1 Jug o'
Sauces[from Parthar et al again]) which don't trivial until 84...from then it
is Fish Rolls until 130something (problee 135) (1 Batwing, 1 fish)...

My baking is 130something(along with just about every other trade skill, sans
tailoring}..beyond that i think you have to do pies and such to get to
200...but anything over 60 is sufficient for the PvP recipies...Baking runs
along the lines of Brewing, where Trivial really is trivial, and you rarely
fail on the items below your skill level...

Kaleid
23rd song Half Elf Bard
Glyphed Aegiss
27th Level Dark Elf Magician
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus

On a Side note, I have alot of fun with my magician [see above sig] when people
try to "Pull" me in mistmoore 8^P. More accurately, when people try to figure
out why there is a Glyphed Aegis in Cazic Thule 8^).
